nodes.text: Army B was a unit of the Trade Federation Droid Army. In 32 BBY, during the Invasion of Naboo, it was sent to flank the Gungan Grand Army during the Battle of Grassy Plains. Army B was destroyed while attacking a Naboo Resistance base.

Army B appeared in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Starfighter. It was later identified in a diagram of the Battle of Grassy Plains in the reference book The New Essential Guide to Vehicles and Vessels.
